readable.title: 501320769_31eea7b7ea
readable.content: A child in a white bathrobe is standing in a doorway . A man in a bathrobe with its arms tied together crosses a threshold . A young black child is wrapped in a white robe and standing in a bathroom doorway . A young black girl emerges from the bathroom wrapped in a bathrobe and towel . A young girl wearing a white bathrobe stands by a door .
